INPUT_FILE.description: The assessment file to be processed.

OUTPUT_DIR.description: The directory to output the resulting jsonl files.

STATE_FILE.description: The file which maintains the tool state.

STUDENT_ID_NAME.description: The student ID column from the assessment file to use as the studentUniqueId. This will only be used if the parameter 'COMPUTE_MATCH_RATES' == 'False' and the parameter 'STUDENT_ID_MATCH_RATES' is empty.

POSSIBLE_STUDENT_ID_COLUMNS.description: The set of student ID columns from the assessment file to compare to Ed-Fi student IDs using the compute_match_rates package

TEST_DATE.description: Arbitrary date that the assessment was taken (since ILEARN export file does not provide a test date/year

TEST_YEAR.description: Year that the assessment was taken (since ILEARN export file does not provide a test date/year
